DOC.brief_summary: The aim study extend previously report 1 year follow-up carpal tunnel release , match diabetic non-diabetic patient , compare outcomes 5 year surgery .
DOC.detailed_description: The Follow-up investigation include : 1 . Clinical examination sensory motor function 2 . Generic disease specific self-administered questionnaire 3 . Nerve conduction study 4 . Vibration threshold test
DOC.criteria: diabetic nondiabetic patient operate carpal tunnel syndrome 5 year ago . previous carpal tunnel release hand study clinical sign nerve entrapment CTS cervical radiculopathy , inflammatory joint disease renal failure thyroid disorder previous wrist fracture affect side daily longterm exposure vibrate tool pregnancy
